title: Move selected Share Link group to end of container (Love Letter Page)

requirements.summary: Reorder the Share Link section so the specified four DOM elements render consecutively at the end of their current parent container without changing any other page content.
acceptanceCriteria: All four selected elements are rendered consecutively as a single group at the end (bottom) of their parent container, not before other sibling content.
The relative order of the four selected elements remains the same as before the change.
No other sections/content outside the selected elements are moved, removed, restyled, or otherwise changed.
All user-facing text remains in English (no new non-English strings introduced as part of this change).

file_operations.description: Move the existing Share Link Section wrapper (the element corresponding to /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[5]/div[1] and its specified descendant nodes) to the end of its current parent container by reordering only that existing JSX block so it renders after the footer, preserving internal order and making no other content/layout changes.
